title: How to Learn Ruby
content:
Ruby is a dynamic, open-source programming language known for its simplicity and productivity. It powers popular frameworks like Ruby on Rails, making it a great choice for web development. Ruby's elegant syntax and strong community support make it a joy to work with.

To learn Ruby, start with the basics of the language, including object-oriented programming concepts, strings, arrays, and hashes. Then, dive into Rails for web development, exploring topics like MVC architecture, routing, and database integration.
author: Areeka
